str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
